result.name: tribunals-service-case-management-systems-including-aria-ethos-and-caseflow-gaps-2-martha-cica-
result.notes: Case management system for immigration, asylum and bail appeal tribunals. Details include name, sex, date of birth and address of defendant, case type, personal details of third parties involved, details of solicitors and judges involved if applicable, dates of hearing, location of hearing, documents involved and recorded outcomes and adjournments.

organization.name: ministry-of-justice
organization.title: Ministry of Justice
organization.description:
We work to protect the public and reduce reoffending, and to provide a more effective, transparent and responsive criminal justice system for victims and the public.

MOJ is a ministerial department, supported by 37 agencies and public bodies.

https://www.gov.uk/government/organisations/ministry-of-justice
